attributes.action: David Cameron to stay as Prime Minister until EOP in its exit out of the EU
attributes.additional_details:
The UK people did not vote to have a different Prime Minster, you did not say before the referendum that if you lost you would quit. 

You said don't QUIT, but you have QUIT on the UK.
attributes.background:
David Cameron to stay as Prime Minister until End of next Parliament in its exit out of the EU.

David Cameron to stay on as Prime Minister to "carry out the instructions of the British people" and withdrawal from the European Union, and give the UK the best possible exit.
